arts.ttl: ‘How brave you are’ – Getafe learn boss Bordalás’ punishment for referee comments
arts.sum: Getafe head coach José Bordalás has been sanctioned with a two-match suspension, owing to his actions in the club’s most recent outing. Getafe marked their return to action this past…

Another stellar weekend of LaLiga action will be headlined by Barcelona's trip to unbeaten Villarreal and Joe Champion has score predictions for that contest and all the other tussles in the Spanish top flight.
